CustomField.description: Used for Quote Line Report for Engineering
CustomField.formula: IF( OR(Regular_Unit_Price_Each__c >8000000, ISPICKVAL(Engineering_Status__c, 'Requires Approval'), ISPICKVAL(Requires_Technical_Review__c , 'Yes'), Regular_Unit_Price_Each__c = 0) ,'Yes', 'No')
CustomField.label: Requires Eng Support
